mapper.select: select ID, ACTIVITY_NAME activityName, to_char(START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') startDate, to_char(END_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') endDate from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_CONFIG where START_DATE >= to_date(SYSDATE) order by ID desc
select id, ACTIVITY_NAME name from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_CONFIG where ACTIVITY_TYPE = #{type} order by id desc
